results.name: Difference between n^2 and the largest cube <= n^2.
comment: a(n) = 0 when n is a cube. See A070923.
link: Zak Seidov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
mathematica: Table[a = n^2; a - Floor[a^(1/3)]^3, {n, 0, 300}] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 03 2011 *)
results.author: _Zak Seidov_ and _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 15 2002
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_ at the suggestion of _Zak Seidov_, Oct 30 2008
